access_token.description: The `access_token` representing the new generated identity.

delegates.description: Delegate chain of approvals needed to perform full impersonation. Specify the fully qualified service account name.  (e.g. `['projects/-/serviceAccounts/delegate-svc-account@project-id.iam.gserviceaccount.com']`)

lifetime.description: Lifetime of the impersonated token (defaults to its max: `3600s`)

scopes.description: The scopes the new credential should have (e.g. `['cloud-platform']`)
